name: chance
description:
Experimental Game Boy RPG based on the true story of Genie Chance.

This is the podcast episode where I learned about her story: https://99percentinvisible.org/episode/chance-anchorwoman-great-alaska-earthquak... 

Key Mappings:

Up - Up Arrow / W

Down - Down Arrow / S

Left - Left Arrow / A

Right - Right Arrow / D

A - Alt / Z / J

B - Ctrl / K / X

Start - Enter

Select - Shift  

Built using GB Studio.
